instruction: I want to turn the rectangular image of Columbus on the first page into a cover page. Could you help me stretch this image to fill the entire page, keeping its proportion and centering the image?

minimal: `HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+C' the width of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+V' paste the width and height of the Paper Format
`DOUBLE_CLICK` the height of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+C' the height of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+V' paste the width and height of the Paper Format
batched: `DOUBLE_CLICK` the width of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+C' the width of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+V' paste the width and height of the Paper Format
`DOUBLE_CLICK` the height of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+C' the height of the Paper Format
`HOTKEY` 'Ctrl+V' paste the width and height of the Paper Format
